import React, { Component } from 'react' // 引入样式文件 import styles from '../../style/Weather.module.less' // 引入请求接口文件 import { getWeatherDate } from '../../api/weather' // 引入 localStorage 方法 import storage from '../../utils/storage' class Weather extends Component{ constructor () { super() this.state = { weatherData : {}, fiveDayList : [] } } componentDidMount = () => { getWeatherDate() .then((data) => { storage.setItem('weatherList', data.data) console.log('📇📜: Weather -> componentDidMount -> this', data) }) .catch((err) => { console.log('调用接口错误', err) }) } shouldComponentUpdate = (nextProps, nextState) => { console.log('📇📜: Weather -> shouldComponentUpdate -> nextState', nextState) let data = storage.getItem('weatherList') if (nextState.weatherList.city === undefined) { this.setState({ weatherList : data, fiveDayList : data.fiveDayList }) return true } else { return false } } render(){ let { weatherList, fiveDayList } = this.state console.log(this) return(
2
